name: Hellspawn Demo 1.2
description: Can you defeat Satan and escape Hell? Find out in this foul-mouthed, balls-to-the-wall adventure! Blast enemies and NPCs alike with elemental attacks! Inflict terrible conditions on opponents from a wide-ranging, element-based status effect system. Level and evolve spells by practicing the mystic artes. Find gear with random assets which can be removed and used to craft even stronger gear. Use your elemental attacks to solve environmental puzzles. And all sorts of other things, only some of which is in this demo! This is a reworking of a Game Jam game. There is no way to advance past the first town.
